summary: This document is a series of official inmate count sheets from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated August 10, 2019. It records census and verification counts for various housing units within the facility, totaling 758 inmates. The document is significant as it provides a routine administrative record from the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was held at the time of his death.

events.title: Daily Inmate Count at MCC New York
events.description: Routine official inmate census and verification counts were conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

keyFacts: The document is a Bureau of Prisons count sheet from the New York Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC).
The count was conducted on August 10, 2019, with timestamps around 01:20:48 and 00:35:17.
The total inmate census recorded was 758 individuals across multiple housing units (e.g., B-A, C-A, E-N, E-S, G-N, G-S, H-A, I-N, K-N, K-S, R-A, Z-A, Z-B).
A verification count resulted in a total of 754 inmates, showing a discrepancy of 4 from the initial census.
This is a routine administrative document from the facility where Jeffrey Epstein died on August 10, 2019.
